"The amount of heavy snow we've received this winter is unprecedented," Kirsten Gillibrand said. Federal assistance is absolutely critical to helping these hardworking farm families recover. The USDA's Farm Service Agency's emergency loans go to help supplement famers' incomes after crop and livestock loss, pay to replace or repair of property, alleviate production costs and refinance debts.
